title: Market share of leading smartphone brands in the Netherlands 2017 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Race Samsung had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Race Sony for 2018.
Among all the Races, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and lowest SOME LABEL in Race Sony.
There is a gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Race Samsung and Sony.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Races, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and lowest SOME LABEL in Race Sony.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2018 that was found in Race Samsung was 0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Sony.
Among all 2 groups, 2017 had the gap of 38.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Samsung and Microsoft respectively.
On average, the Race Samsung had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Microsoft had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
